lead_paragraph: Basketballer Patty Mills will don the green and gold of Australia at the Rio de Janeiro Games but gained inspiration for his third Olympics in the red dust of his country's vast, empty heartland.

headline.print_headline: Mills Taps Australian Heartland for Rio Inspiration
headline.main: Mills Taps Australian Heartland for Rio Inspiration

snippet: Basketballer Patty Mills will don the green and gold of Australia at the Rio de Janeiro Games but gained inspiration for his third Olympics in the red dust of his country's vast, empty heartland....
